english_example_sentence: When you cut the fresh bread, its smell spreads into the room.
russian_example_sentence: Когда ты режешь свежий хлеб, его запах распространяется по комнате.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen taze ekmeği kestiğinde, kokusu odaya yayılır.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen taze ekmeği ______de, kokusu odaya yayılır.
